actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to make the knowing disclosure of classified information by Federal officers and employees a criminal offense.
short_title: National Security and Classified Information Protection Act of 1993

summary.text: National Security and Classified Information Protection Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal criminal code to make the knowing disclosure of classified information to an unauthorized person by present and former Federal officials and employees a criminal offense.

titles.title: National Security and Classified Information Protection Act of 1993
To amend title 18, United States Code, to make the knowing disclosure of classified information by Federal officers and employees a criminal offense.
